TopicTitle: RSS feeds for every KSP Dev Team member [Added NovaSilisko]

Articles.Content:
Here is a collection of RSS feeds, one for each member of the KSP dev team. Each one updates once every 6 hours and shows the latest 15 posts by that person.

Note that it will break the feed if they post a large image but works fine for most non GIFs and text.

[Here](https://www.google.com/reader/bundle/user%2F05595316783687031207%2Fbundle%2FKSP%20Developer%20Posts)

Since Google won\'t let me edit the old bundle to add in new feeds i had to make a new one. Here\'s a link to NovaSilisko\'s feed for those with the old bundle: [Here](http://feed43.com/2551280808021735.xml)

I made this using [feed43](http://feed43.com/).

Ultimate stalker tool ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

No really, i feel like a creepy person when viewing that.
Yeah there is a little bit of that but there\'s no substitute if you want up to date and detailed information on progress and recent events.
Can you make it track all the dev accounts to make it a 'for reals' dev tracker? (Mu, C7 and N3x1S post quite a bit, and Alex and the rest do from time to time)

> 
> No really, i feel like a creepy person when viewing that.

It\'s not like he writes posts about his personal life here ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Can you make it track all the dev accounts to make it a 'for reals' dev tracker? (Mu, C7 and N3x1S post quite a bit, and Alex and the rest do from time to time)

It would be easy enough to make one for every dev. not sure about combining them though, I\'ll look into it.

EDIT: I replaced the original Harvester feed and added a link to a Google Reader bundle containing individual feeds for each dev member.
Updated the bundle to include a feed of NovaSilisko\'s posts.
So, how does it feel to be famous annd tracked? ;P
No one who\'s been tapped has commented yet but i hope it\'s with pride and confidence rather than a slowly creeping paranoia that eventually consumes the soul.
